Method Detail

isRepresentsSection

boolean isRepresentsSection()
If true indicates that the contents of this view is a tab of a section.

Returns:
True or false.

setRepresentsSection

void setRepresentsSection(boolean representsSection)
Sets the type of view. False is a normal view, true is a section (tab) view.

Parameters:
representsSection - Value to be set.
